ProductInfo.Features:

<4> Battery Charger + <5> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <6> PD Mini Sling Backpack +
<7> PD-T14 Flexible Camera Tripod + <8> 62mm UV Filter + <9> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<10> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <12> LCD Screen Protectors + <13> Image Recovery Software
